title: #101: Discussing 13 Reasons Why with Cheryl Eskin of Teen Line
description:
The RCP team (Jim Clemente, Laura Richards and Lisa Zambetti) welcome Cheryl Eskin of Teen Line to the show. They discuss the show 13 Reasons Why and analyze its portrayal of teen suicide and mental health. Plus they provide hope to people who feel lost.

Visit Teenline online

https://teenlineonline.org

Call 310 855-4673
